ARABIC: فَذَرْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُوا۟ يَوْمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يُصْعَقُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Leave them then until they meet their Day when they will be struck down by the Blast:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So, leave them until they face their day (of doom) when they will be stunned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs when they shall be struck down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: So leave them alone until they face the day when they will be struck dead from terror
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore leave them, until they confront their day, in which they will be stunned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So leave them alone till they meet their Day, in which they will sink into a fainting (with horror).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Leave them then till they meet that day of theirs wherein they shall be made to swoon (with terror):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then leave them, till they encounter their day wherein they shall be thunderstruck,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then let them be (O Muhammad), till they meet their day, in which they will be thunder-stricken,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so leave them alone till they face the Day on which they will be struck dumb,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore let them alone, till they meet their Day whereon they shall swoon.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So leave them until they encounter the day when they will be thunderstruck,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So leave them alone until they encounter that Day of theirs, wherein they shall (perforce) swoon (with terror),-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So leave them alone till they meet their Day, in which they will sink into a fainting (with horror).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So leave them till they encounter their Day in which they shall be thunderstruck.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be stunned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [52:45] So leave them until they encounter that day of theirs in which they will be thunderstruck, [in which] they will die;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then let them be) leave them, Muhammad, (till they meet) until they behold (their day, in which they will be thunder-stricken) they will die,
